raw_comment:
I notice that fossil fuels are the main source of energy in the world with coal leading. Also wind and solar energy are used the least with nuclear and hydroelectric energy being used more.

I wonder how fossil fuels are still the main source of energy especially since our fossil fuels are expected to run out in the near future.

This relates to me and my community because debates of what energy is safe and should be used by the US to keep the environment more healthy.

Energy Consumption: Fossil Fuels Continue to Lead The Way
ace_sentences: Fossil fuels are the main source of energy in the world.
Coal is the leading fossil fuel.
Wind energy is used the least.
Solar energy is used the least.
Nuclear energy is used more than wind energy and solar energy.
Hydroelectric energy is used more than wind energy and solar energy.
Fossil fuels are expected to run out in the near future.
I wonder why fossil fuels are still the main source of energy.
This issue relates to my community.
In the US, people debate what energy is safe.
In the US, people debate what energy should be used.
These debates aim to keep the environment healthier.
The headline is: Energy Consumption: Fossil Fuels Continue to Lead The Way.
